item.title: Magical Librarian Ariana: The Books of Seven Heroes first details, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/magical-librarian-ariana-the-books-of-seven-heroes-first-details-screenshots

Get the details below.

■ Prologue

1,500 years ago, there was a person who brought magic to humanity. That person gifted mankind four magic books called “The Books of the Four Elements,” which produce magic power, and a “Magic Pen” that creates magic books.

Once humanity learned of the concepts of “magic” and “magic power,” they used the Magic Pen to create various magic books.

Among those books, three known as “The Books of the Three Phenomena” were said to possess magic power comparable to the Books of the Four Elements. These seven books are collectively called “The Books of the Seven Heroes,” and the facility for managing and mending magic books is called the “Library.”

Present day—.

An incident breaks out in the Library, a vast aggregation of knowledge and the source of all magic power. Someone has tampered with the Books of the Seven Heroes.

As a result, magic disappeared from the world…

■ Story

Ariana the librarian’s mission is to restore the Books of the Seven Heroes, which have been tampered with. By using her special librarian magic to enter books, will Ariana be able to successfully repair all seven books and solve the mystery of the Library?

■ Characters

Ariana Virellis (voiced by ???)

The protagonist. As the world’s only librarian possessing “the magic to enter books,” she must restore the Books of the Seven Heroes. She is also searching for her parents, who went missing when she was a child.

John Berkeley (voiced by Ryuuzaburoo Ootomo)

Chief librarian at the Library where Ariana works. He tasks Ariana, who possesses “the magic to enter books,” to restore the Books of the Seven Heroes.

Vester (voiced by Kikuko Inoue)

An automata made by Divina. She refers to Ariana as “Milady” and supports her livelihood.

Divina Orden (voiced by Sally Amaki)

A grand wizard who researches magic at the Library. She has authored a great number of books in the Library. She is a close friend of Ariana’s parents. She considers it her duty to watch over Ariana’s growth, and provides her various support.

Astreo Virellis (voiced by Jun Fukuyama)

Ariana’s father. He seems to have gone missing when Ariana was a child…

Eleanor Virellis (voiced by Kikuko Inoue)

Ariana’s mother. She seems to have gone missing when Ariana was a child…

item.title: MAGES. announces food puzzle game BAKUMORI Dining for PS5, PS4, and Switch; now available in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/mages-announces-food-puzzle-game-bakumori-dining-for-ps5-ps4-and-switch-now-available-in-japan

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

How much food can you pile on your plate?

MAGES. has announced BAKUMORI Dining, a food puzzle game for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch. It is available now via PlayStation Store and Nintendo eShop in Japan for 1,100 yen, or at a launch discount price of 770 yen until May 20 (discount only for PlayStation Plus members on PlayStation platforms).

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

Welcome! Here, you can pile as much food on your plate as you want, as long as it doesn’t fall off! Whether foods stick out or get tangled up is no matter—just make sure everything stays on the plate. Create your very own BAKUMORI meal!

Key Features

  • Seven stages and three bonus stages.
  • Over 70 types of food.
  • Make things harder or easier with the Skill feature.
  • Served foods explode beautifully! (Please do not try this with real food.)

How much food can you pile on your plate? Your challenge awaits!
